item.title: Visual Studio Code
item.description: Visual shortcuts cmd + B Toogle side bar cmd + alt + right/left arrow Next/previous editor cmd + number Change editor group cmd + ctrl + right/left arrow Split or move file to group Navigation shortcuts cmd + shift + o Go to symbol in file cmd + alt + k Toggle bookmark (extension) cmd + alt + l/j Next/previous bookmark (extension) Others Add types to variables on javascript files:
